Bert Hansen collection of advertising fans
BH-024. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet
BH-024. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet

Vase shape when closed. Painted illustration of southern scenes: a bayou with a riverboat under a moonlit sky, young elite couple, log cabin with a smoking chimney, and two Black men playing banjoes seated on the dock. Kreamer Funeral Service, Annville, Pennsylvania.
